name: BLACK MANGO
greetingText: How tall are you now? like 5
wishText: May the force be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy Birthday Pookie! Your presence in my life is a gift, and I hope your special day is as wonderful as you are. Here's to more shared moments and endless smiles ahead!
outroText: Okay, that's cringyyy XD! Hope you ate good
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again. BYE.
